results.purpose: Internal business planning document for The Pets Table (TPT) brand tracking development work, JIRA tickets, GitHub activity, and active experiments
key_data_points: 9 open Pull Requests for The Pets Table
10 JIRA tickets in various states (Blocked, Backlog, In Review, In Progress, Closed)
7 recent commits in last 5 hours to 3 days
50+ active Statsig experiments across multiple brands
High priority: CA Seamless downgrade issue (Closed), Pre/post Elysium analysis (Urgent, In Review)
Key focus areas: Portion percentage selection, calorie adjustments, OTP (One-Time Purchase) functionality, quiz testing

entities.name: The Pets Table (TPT)
entities.context: Primary brand with most active development - 9 PRs, portion/calorie features

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: Sub-brand with OTP order history and discount communications work

entities.name: Good Chop
entities.context: Brand working on one-time-deliveries page and OTP detection

entities.name: Market Innovation
entities.context: Minimal activity - 1 commit removing Shopify redirect logic

entities.name: Guhan Sundararajan (@Guhan21)
entities.context: Active developer on TPT portion options and calorie adjustments

entities.name: Andrea Martins
entities.context: Recent commits on allergens E2E tests and checkout fixes

entities.name: Elysium
entities.context: System under urgent pre/post analysis review

entities.name: Katana
entities.context: System mentioned in OTP order traceability ticket

entities.name: HelloFresh
entities.context: Parent company - multiple market experiments (US, UK, GB, FR, DE, NL, BE, AU)

insights: Heavy focus on portion percentage and calorie adjustment features for TPT with multiple related PRs in flight
One-Time Purchase (OTP) functionality is a cross-brand initiative affecting TPT, Factor Form, and Good Chop
Several blocked tickets related to data migration and reporting metrics suggest infrastructure challenges
Extensive A/B testing across markets with 50+ active Statsig experiments covering pricing, CRM, demand steering, and checkout flows
Recent work emphasizes E2E test stability (unquarantining tests) and GTM event tracking improvements
Geographic expansion evident with experiments running in US, UK, GB, FR, DE, NL, BE, AU, Nordics markets
Payment success rate and perfect order rate metrics are under active definition/review
Migration to v2 products API for PetsTable has been in progress for 23 days (oldest open PR)
